item.title: Sources: RB Lacy signs new deal with Ole Miss
item.description: Ole Miss star running back Kewan Lacy signed a deal to return for the Rebels in 2026, sources told ESPN on Monday.

item.title: Sources: Hawks, Young working together on trade
item.description: Atlanta Hawks four-time All-Star Trae Young and his agent, Aaron Mintz, are working with the franchise on a trade, sources told ESPN.
